TopicTitle: Why is the universe noticeably jittering?

Articles.Content:
When I hover over an apside or maneuver node in the orbit, the text is just barely noticeably jittering. Why is that and how do I fix it?

Mod list:

  • Distant Object Enhancement
  • RCS Build Aid
  • Scatterer
  • Both DLCs
  • WaterfallFX
  • Trajectories
In Scatterer, Disable the temporal anti aliasing.
